nodes.text: Botiq was an entity that advertised in the planet of Coruscant's HoloNet News in 23 and 22 BBY. Its advertisement was a blue-tinted box that framed a pair of shoes. The name "Botiq," written in the High Galactic alphabet and colored white with a black shadow, lay in the foreground.

Botiq's advertisement appeared in HoloNet News, an in-universe website created in 2002 to publicize the then-upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film. Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens wrote the site content.
